Order

# Order

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class               | Support     |
| ------------------- | ----------- |
| ```
order-1
```     | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
order-2
```     | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
order-3
```     | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
order-4
```     | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
order-5
```     | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
order-6
```     | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
order-7
```     | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
order-8
```     | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
order-9
```     | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
order-10
```    | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
order-11
```    | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
order-12
```    | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
order-first
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
order-last
```  | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
order-none
```  | 🌐 Web only |
